nodes.text: This cousin of Walon Vau was an Irmenu noble who gained Walon's inheritance and the title of Count of Gesl after Walon was disowned by his family for joining the Mandalorians. Vau later robbed him of his fortune after he plundered the vault of the Counts of Gesl in the Dressian Kiolsh Merchant Bank on Mygeeto during the Clone Wars to regain his inheritance.
